title: Mobile Science Learning Environment Design: Microlearning Customized for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific knowledge and experience with mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in designing mobile learning environments linked to science curricula

learning_goals: Learners can explain seven core characteristics (e.g., situational learning, mobility) for designing mobile learning environments
Learners can apply design procedures for converting science education content into mobile microlearning formats
Learners can select interactive elements (quizzes, AR simulations) suitable for large-scale mobile learning courses for working professionals

resources: AR/VR Sample Content for Science Education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
